name.en: Lancea, Dragonic Ancestor of the Ice Spirit Mountain
name.ja: <ruby>氷<rt>じょう</rt></ruby><ruby>霊<rt>れい</rt></ruby><ruby>山<rt>ざん</rt></ruby>の<ruby>龍<rt>りゅう</rt></ruby><ruby>祖<rt>そ</rt></ruby> ランセア

text.en:
1 WATER Tuner + 1+ non-Tuner monsters
Once per Chain, if your opponent Special Summons a monster(s): You can Special Summon 1 "Ice Barrier" monster from your hand, Deck, Extra Deck, or GY, then you can change 1 opponent's Attack Position monster to Defense Position. You can only use this effect of "Lancea, Dragonic Ancestor of the Ice Spirit Mountain" up to twice per turn. If this face-up Synchro Summoned card in its owner's control leaves the field by an opponent's card: You can Special Summon 1 "Ice Barrier" Synchro Monster from your Extra Deck. (This is treated as a Synchro Summon.)

materials: 1 WATER Tuner + 1 or more non-Tuner monsters
